evidence.claim: UST ContineoHealth leverages AWS services for scalability and data storage.
Implementation of FHIR standards is evident in their patient data management solutions.
Their architecture supports integration with EHR systems, utilizing HL7 protocols.
UST ContineoHealth has capabilities to handle X12 transactions including 837 and 835 formats.
Use of Azure API Management for secure API access is detailed in their technical documentation.

icp.icp_reason: Company utilizes X12 transactions and health tech focused on claims and eligibility, fitting ICP.
